attributes.action: GIVE BACK FUNDING FOR KIDZ YOUNG CARERS PROJECT IN EALING
attributes.additional_details: YET ANOTHER GOOD CHARITY FOR YOUNG PEOPLE IN EALING HAS BEEN CUT - EALING HAS JUST BEEN RIOTED BY SOME YOUNG PEOPLE, THIS PROJECT WAS TO HELP YOUNG PEOPLE WHO CARE FOR THERE PARENTS HAVE A BREAK AND FROM CARING AND BE CHILDREN AGAIN. THEY SET UP EVENTS AND TRIPS FOR YOUNG CARERS TO GO TO. I WANT TO SEE THEM GET THERE FUNDING BACK AS IT HAS BEEN GIVEN TO ANOTHER BOROUGH (who didnt have a riots) WE NEED MORE OF THESE TYPE OF CHARITIES NOT LESS TO REWARD THE GOOD THAT YOUNG PEOPLE DO.
